results.title: Growth Lead - BitNetwork
results.description:
Context

Windranger is a product lab working on the BitDAO ecosystem. You can read more about us here. Over the next few years, BitDAO intends to secure a handful of large partnerships (on the scale of zkSync, Game7, BitNetwork).

As proposed by one of BitDAO’s core contributors, BitDAO is looking to build a chain (BITNetwork) that: uses $BIT as a native token; is EVM compatible; and optimized for high throughput dapps such as derivatives dexes and gaming.


Your Role

  • Business development and partnership lead to engage partner applications and tools in the BitNetwork ecosystem, across all verticals such as gaming, defi, art, social, sports, etc.

  • Formulate builder oriented narratives

  • Strategize and execute key partnership deals whilst advising partners on industry trends and best practices

  • Identify features and tools required for web2 to web3 user onboarding, game engine integration, financial institution adoptions for the engineering team to implement

  • Align internal resources to support the integration and onboarding of new partners

     

Your Craft

  • 5+ years in business development, ecosystem partnership or growth roles

  • Experience working in a variety of technology first sectors such as defi, blockchain, gaming, social media etc...

  • Ability to build and grow a high performing business development / growth team

  • Knowledge of web3 gaming, social preferred

results.title: Partner Manager
results.description:
Who are we?

We are Elliptic. We pioneered the use of blockchain analytics and financial crime compliance, becoming the leading provider of crypto compliance solutions globally. Our products are used by some of the world’s leading cryptocurrency exchanges, financial institutions and government agencies to screen over $1 billion of transactions every single week.

We couldn’t achieve our mission without our incredible team of Elliptites. We’ve come a long way since 2013, and we have a long way left to go. That’s why we’re always looking for talented, passionate people to join us in the cryptoasset revolution and shape the future of finance with us.

Our values aren’t just buzzwords; everything Elliptites do, together as a company and for our customers, is grounded in our values of Empowerment, Positive Impact, Openness, Creating Connections and Curiosity. It isn’t just what we do that matters - it’s how and why we do it.

 

What’s the role?

Our Partner Manager is responsible for driving Partner success, as measured by customer outcomes (e.g., new customer acquisition, integrations, customer satisfaction) and revenue generated from each Partner.

 

What will you do?

  • Drive Partner success from integration through growth and renewal
  • Wakes up every morning thinking about how to better enable our Partners’ commercial and product teams via incentives, enablement, co-marketing and product workflows
  • Act as the operational owner of our Partnerships function - supporting the VP Strategic Alliances to
    • Document and execute against GTM, Product, and Launch playbooks,
    • Ensure tools and systems are optimised,
    • Deliver weekly and monthly reporting
    • Run QBR processes with Partners,
    • Ensure we have Account Maps and Plans for each Partner
  • Partner closely with with Sales and Marketing teams to make sure that our GTM playbooks are being continuously improved and that our execution with our Partners is coordinated, increasing the effectiveness of our go to market motions between Sales, Marketing and Partnerships
  • Partner closely with product, engineering, data and research teams on new releases, develop deep understanding of our products to create deep and differentiated product integrations and associated roadmaps

Requirements

What will you bring?

  • Experience in a Partnerships, Business Development or Growth Strategy role
  • Strong written and verbal communication and influencing skills
  • Ability to simplify complex ideas and messages into clear, bite-sized content
  • Web3 or RegTech experience and an understanding of the industry landscape
  • Product partnership experience preferred
  • B2B experience preferred

Benefits

What’s in it for you?

Let’s get to the good stuff: besides being part of an incredible team, what does joining Elliptic mean for you?

  • You’ll be paid a competitive salary, along with Share Options
  • As well as a work pension scheme, enhanced parental leave, and 25 days holiday, you’ll also get a day off to celebrate your birthday - have a drink for us!
  • We take your physical and mental health seriously - that’s why we provide private healthcare and access to Spill Mental Health Support, as well as a $500 work-from-home budget to make that home office extra comfy
  • You’ll be working with top-of-the-range equipment, with access to our snazzy office (with unlimited snacks, and lunch on us every other Wednesday), plus quarterly off-sites including an annual company offsite in a fantastic location (our 2022 offsite is in sunny Portugal!)
  • Your personal development is important to us, so you’ll have a $1000 annual budget to use, not just on professional qualifications, but on anything that pushes you towards your goals. You’ll also have access to a LinkedIn Learning subscription.

 

We’re committed to creating a diverse, inclusive and equitable workplace. Our people are our biggest asset; we have mountain bikers, skiers, surfers, runners, gamers, actors, musicians, social media influencers, and every other variety of people. We have family people, single people, extroverts, introverts, and everything in between. We welcome and embrace people from all backgrounds and identities at Elliptic, and encourage you to apply for any role that gets you fired up, even if you’re not sure at first glance that you have everything we’ve mentioned.

results.title: Product Manager
results.description:
About Doodles

Doodles is here to color the world and show everyone that anything is possible with the power of their imagination. Already a leading native in Web3, Doodles’ mission is to redefine what it means to be a world class entertainment brand. From collectibles to music, gaming and more, Doodles develops the most joyful products and experiences in the world. Are you ready to join the ever-expanding Doodles universe and lead with industry-changing innovation? It all starts with a doodle.

About the Role

Doodles is looking for an experienced Product Manager to immerse millions of fans into our Web3 ecosystem. As a Doodles Product Manager, you’ll report to the Head of Product and be responsible for end-to-end delivery - from ideation to shipping, then continued iteration. You will help define our roadmap with your successful product learnings while leading a team of talented internal/external engineers and designers.

Responsibilities

  • Own the definition, strategy, and execution for your features or products.

  • Contribute to the product roadmap and its evolution.

  • Create engineering and design documentation to get your team on the same page with respect to business and end user goals.

  • Lead a small, cross-functional team and take end-to-end responsibility for your product’s execution.

  • Prioritize ruthlessly through leveraging user research and data/market analyses and making strong cases to internal stakeholders.

  • Develop go-to-market strategies collaborating with Partnerships, Marketing, and Leadership teams.

Skills We’re Looking For

  • 4+ years end-to-end product management experience at high-growth tech companies building consumer products.

  • Excellent understanding of Web3 and its challenges with respect to user experience

  • Proven track record leading/shipping with agile teams.

  • Ability to thrive in the scrappiness of an early-stage startup.

  • Ability to work with stakeholders across diverse internal teams responsible for art, design, engineering, and marketing.

  • Authorized to work in the United States.

Doodles is an equal opportunity employer. We are committed to building and fostering an inclusive, accessible environment for everyone. For questions or concerns regarding accessibility needs please contact hr@doodles.app for assistance.
